underlying_goal: Implement and execute a staged verification workflow (SM2) to check that data registered via SM1 is correctly displayed on production web pages, using Playwright browser automation for step-by-step testing
friction_detail: PPV page initially redirected to top page on first access attempt, and user questioned whether subtitle check was actually comparing registered data vs displayed data accurately.
brief_summary: User wanted to implement and execute a staged production check workflow using Playwright to verify registered PPV data displays correctly on web pages; Phases 0-3 were partially completed with some navigation and verification accuracy issues.
